attribute.name: betweenKeyUp
attribute.description: If the time between two keyup events is lower than this given value, the ajax request will not be fired. In milliseconds. Prevents stressing the server with too much user inputs. In driven tests the component seems to be more stable if this value is set. A recommended value in which case the component works very well is about 300ms.

attribute.name: startRequest
attribute.description: The AJAX Request is only triggered if the number of chars typed in is equal or greater than this given value.

attribute.name: var
attribute.description: Same principle as it can be found in dataTable. SuggestedItemsMethod returns a list of objects, where the class variables can be accessed with the alias after the dot of the var.

attribute.name: popupId
attribute.description: Id for the pop up window

attribute.name: popupStyleClass
attribute.description: StyleClass for the window with a suggested list of items;pop up for each incoming Ajax response

attribute.name: comboBoxStyleClass
attribute.description: StyleClass for dropdown box and arrow.

attribute.name: rowStyleClass
attribute.description: StyleClass which applies to every row in the suggested table.

attribute.name: evenRowStyleClass
attribute.description: StyleClass which only applies to even rows in the suggested table.

attribute.name: oddRowStyleClass
attribute.description: StyleClass which only applies to odd rows in the suggested table.

attribute.name: hoverRowStyleClass
attribute.description: StyleClass for the rows for onmouseover events.
